def get_final_varfiles(vartpl):
    file_paths = ('', 'sub/foo', 'sub/foo.c')
    varfiles = []
    for (i, path) in enumerate(file_paths):
        varfile = f'{path}.{vartpl[i]}'
        varfiles.append(varfile)
    return varfiles

def get_final_varfiles(vartpl):
    file_paths = ('foo', 'sub/foo', 'sub/foo.c')
    varfiles = []
    for (i, path) in enumerate(file_paths):
        varfile = f'{path}{vartpl[i]}'
        varfiles.append(varfile)
    return varfiles
